pullRequest.body:
In this PR, we show that a Grothendieck topology on a category `C` (with `C : Type u` and `[Category.{v} C]`) is (obviously) generated by 1-hypercovers of size `max u v`.

In order to facilitate this, the type `Cover.Relation` is repackaged in a slightly different manner. Some proofs have been cleaned up. Several `dsimp` lemmas which had been manually added have been removed (and replaced by auto-generated ones).

---
- [x] depends on: #13004


<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

Yes, I think I already reviewed and approved?

Okay just making sure. Thanks Jo√´l and Dagur!
maintainer merge
üöÄ Pull request has been placed on the maintainer queue by erdOne.

Thanks!

bors merge

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9641764414/job/26588108513)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9641764414/job/26588109040)
The refactor of `Relation` seems very reasonable to me and one obtains the `IsGeneratedByOneHypercovers.{max u v}` easily.

```suggestion
  refine Multiequalizer.hom_ext _ _ _ (fun II => ?_)
```

```suggestion
  simp only [Sieve.top_apply, iff_true]
```
I noticed that this `dsimp` is unnecessary but removing it significantly slows down the proof.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(CategoryTheory/Sites): the topology is generated by 1-hypercovers

source.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(CategoryTheory/Sites): functors preserving 1-hypercovers are continuous
feat(CategoryTheory/Sites): under certain conditions, cover preserving functors preserve 1-hypercovers
